title: The Woman Who Cry's

description: You might of seen this title and asumed this was a cute kid friendly story like toy story but no! this is much much much more real and.

title: The Green Dog Food
description: I was on my way home when I was approched by a man, he seemed friendly and he had given me dog food. He said they call it gfood.

title: The Noises In The Attic
description: Now I have been living in this house for two years now, I never expected to find out what or who was living in my attic.

title: The Perfect School
description: My friend john was a naughty child in school, he had refused to do the work, was always fighting and had letters home. However rumour has it that he was sent to a private school and how his parents could afford that school was beyond me as none of tthem had a job.

title: the haunted place
description: This place is so haunted that even spiders get the chills.

title: How To Be Happy
description: this story is one hell of a story you really dont want to miss out!
